dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S2169 PCS: To amend title 54, United States Code, to extend the Land and Water Conservation Fund.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Tester (for himself, Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Heinrich, Mr. Bennet, Mr. Leahy, Mrs. Shaheen, and Mr. Daines) introduced the following bill; which was read the first time
Read the second time and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: To amend title 54, United States Code, to extend the Land and Water Conservation Fund.

section.header: Extension of land and water conservation fund
section.text: Section 200302 of title 54, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking September 30, 2015 and inserting December 11, 2015; and
in subsection (c)(1), by striking “September 30, 2015” and inserting December 11, 2015.

endorsement.action-desc: Read the second time and placed on the calendar
